name: Salty Snail vs The Uprising
description:
Salty Snail vs. The Uprising

Driven from their home planet by a robot army known as the Uprising, a robot army that snatched and replaced a rock band with clones. Defend the salty snails from minions of enemies as well as the clones.

- Touch screen defense

- Soundtrack by The Uprising

- Boss fights

- Test your reflexes as you attempt to protect all of the snails
